statements: SELECT * FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, game_id, transaction_type FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT player_id, transaction_amount FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT game_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM in_game_transactions WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM in_game_transactions WHERE player_id = 456 AND transaction_amount < 50 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM in_game_transactions WHERE player_id = 101 AND transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM in_game_transactions WHERE game_id = 201 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM in_game_transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_spent > 500;
SELECT transaction_type, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM in_game_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM purchases WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT purchase_id, item_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 50;
SELECT purchase_id, item_name, price FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, SUM(price) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT item_name, price FROM purchases ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT item_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '987e6543-bcde-21f3-a654-426612349876' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE item_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_amount FROM purchases;
SELECT SUM(total_revenue) AS total_revenue, SUM(total_expenditure) AS total_expenditure, SUM(net_profit) AS net_profit FROM financial_reports;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_name, item_category, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE player_id = 1001 AND purchase_amount > 50.00;
SELECT player_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_spent > 1000.00;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(purchase_id) FROM purchases GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY COUNT(purchase_id) DESC;
SELECT item_category, AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_amount FROM purchases GROUP BY item_category ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_details WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_title, purchase_amount FROM in_game_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE total_transactions < 1000;
SELECT player_id, transaction_date, amount FROM virtual_currency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_details WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT game_title, purchase_amount FROM in_game_purchases WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY game_title
SELECT player_id, transaction_type FROM virtual_currency_transactions WHERE amount < 0
SELECT report_id, total_purchases, total_transactions FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-05-20'
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, country FROM players WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM purchases ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate, country FROM currencies WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT player_id, session_date FROM analytics WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE item_price > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_datetime DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT transactions.player_id, players.player_name, purchases.item_name, purchases.item_price FROM transactions INNER JOIN players ON transactions.player_id = players.player_id INNER JOIN purchases ON transactions.purchase_id = purchases.purchase_id WHERE purchases.item_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND players.country = 'USA' ORDER BY transactions.transaction_datetime ASC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS purchase_count FROM purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(purchase_id) > 3 ORDER BY purchase_count DESC;
SELECT player_name, country, registration_date FROM players WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01' AND country IN ('USA', 'Canada') ORDER BY country, registration_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT currencies.currency_name, currencies.exchange_rate, SUM(transactions.transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM currencies INNER JOIN transactions ON currencies.currency_id = transactions.currency_id GROUP BY currencies.currency_name, currencies.exchange_rate ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
